channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Strategist Tom Lee says the S&P 500 can reach as high as 7,000 — if two conditions are met
item.description: Strategist Tom Lee is raising his sights on the stock market — if two key conditions are met.

item.title: EVs put Ford and other automakers at a crossroads: Who will innovate the assembly line of the future?
item.description: There’s a race to build more vehicles more efficiently, with Ford, Tesla and others trying to revamp the way cars are made

item.title: My stepmother’s lawyer called us ‘greedy’ for fighting for our father’s estate. When will it end?
item.description: “During the marriage, all his real estate ended up in trusts he didn’t fully understand.”

item.title: ‘I consider myself pretty lucky’: I’m 65 with $4 million. Do I buy an annuity to protect against Social Security’s demise?
item.description: “Do I pay off my 4% mortgages instead of investing my cash?”

item.title: A stablecoin boom will force a return to dollar dominance — but not just yet, this strategist says
item.description: Michael Kelly of PineBridge says the dollar will be choppy until the Fed rate cycle wraps up.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
